testcase.name: Registration user
testcase.summary: New user registration
testcase.preconditions:
1. User has a valid email
  2. User name is free

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the 'email' field, enter the user email

step.expectedresults: Opening the page with 'Link sent to [registration e-mail] to activate the account'

testcase.name: Registration user (wrong password)
testcase.summary: Registration user with wrong passwod

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the ’password’ field, enter the password with 5 characters

testcase.name: Registration user (existing data)
testcase.summary: User registration with existing user name and email
testcase.preconditions:
1. User email is not free
  2. Email is used to registration

step.actions: In the ’user’ field, enter the user name
In the ’email’ field, enter the email, which used to registration

testcase.name: Login by user name
testcase.summary: Logging in using the user name used for registration.

step.actions:
In the ’user or email ’field, enter the user name

testcase.name: Login by email

testcase.name: Login without account
testcase.summary: Logging to site without account
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has not account
  2. password has min. 6 characters
  3. email is correct pattern

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter random characters
In the ’password’ field, enter random characters min. 6

step.expectedresults: reopen logging site, message 'invalid login or password'

testcase.name: Login with wrong user name
testcase.summary: Logging with wrong user name

step.actions: In the ’user or email’ field, enter wrong user name

step.expectedresults: reopening the login page, the message 'incorrect login or password'

testcase.name: Login with wrong password
testcase.summary: Logging with wrong password

step.actions: In the ’use or emailr’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’password’ field, enter the wrong password

step.expectedresults: reopening the login page, the message 'incorrect login or password'

step.actions: In the ’new password’ field, enter the password
In the ’user’ and 'password field, enter the user name nad new password

testcase.name: Login by Facebook

testcase.name: Change password
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password with correct patern
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password'

testcase.name: Change password (invalid)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different using invalid present password

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the random characters
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password

step.expectedresults: password not changed, message 'the password is incorrect'

testcase.name: Change password (different password)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different using two different password

step.actions: In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the new password
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the different characters than 'new password'

step.expectedresults: password do not change, message 'the passwords is different'

testcase.name: Change password (too small characters)
testcase.summary: Changing the password to a different, using 5 characters

step.actions:
wypełnić pole "stare hasło" poprawnymi danymi

In the ’old password’ field, enter the present password
In the ’new password’ field, enter the 5 random characters
In the 'repeat password' field, enter the same characters - 'new password'

testcase.name: Login with new password
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website with new password, changed password.

step.actions: In the ’user name or email’ field, enter the correct data
In the ’password’ field, enter the new changed password

step.expectedresults: user logged in, open the home page

testcase.name: Change email
testcase.summary: Changing email with linked account the website
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has a active new email

step.actions: In the ’new email’ field, enter the new active account
In the 'repeat new email' field, enter the same characters - 'new email'
in the 'password account' field, enter the present password

redirection to the website wykop.pl, changed e-mail

testcase.name: Change email (different emails)
testcase.summary: Changing email with linked account the website use different email
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has a new active email

step.actions: in the 'new email' field, enter the new email
In the 'repeat new email' field, enter the random characters - 'new email'
in the 'password account' field, enter the present password

step.actions: in the 'user name or email' field, enter the new changed email

testcase.name: Login when deleting the account by Facebook (29 days)
testcase.summary: Logging in to the website wykop.pl via FB, 29 days after starting the account deletion procedure
testcase.preconditions:
1. user has account
  2. user has an account lnked with FB
  3. user started deletion account
  4. user log in 29 day after started delete account

step.actions: in the 'email or phone number' dield, enter the correct FB data
in the 'password' field, enter the FB password

step.expectedresults: logging in to wykop.pl, opening the home page, the account deletion procedure aborted

testcase.name: Login when deleting the account (29 days)
